sentences.english: The year of Dragon represents good fortune and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 龍年代表着財運和興盛。

sentences.english: The dragon edition will be available in both the regular Phantom model and the extended wheelbase Phantom model.
sentences.chinese: 常規的幻影車型及幻影加長車型都會推出龍年限量版。

sentences.english: The "Year of the Dragon" is one of the 12 zodiac symbols associated with the Chinese Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 龍年是中國農曆中的十二生肖年之一。

definition: profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
Double Tenth, the anniversary of the Wuchang Uprising 武昌起義|武昌起义[Wu3 chang1 Qi3 yi4] of October 10th, 1911/(Tw) National Day
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
to propitiate the god of the current year, Tai Sui 太歲|太岁[Tai4 sui4]
to start practicing at the first crow of the cock (idiom)/to be diligent in one's studies
full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
